clean_data: Database Administrator span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan Database Administrator Database Developer Owatonna MN Knowledgeable and resultsoriented information technology professional with over 10 years experience and expertise working with databases and programming technologies Exceptionally skilled in database development querying design and application programming with Microsoft products as well as some exposure to opensource development Contributor to information technology teams through continual professional development expert technical knowledge and collaboration with IT staff end users vendors and consultants Extremely interested in data data management data security and the storage of data Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Database Administrator Olmsted Medical Center Rochester MN August 2017 to Present Managed Microsoft SQL Server databases for a health care system Performed regular backups and routine maintenance including creating the backup plan and schedule Routinely monitored servers for performance issues and addressed them as necessary Designed and coded ETL processes using SSIS Wrote SSRS reports including the underlying stored procedures and TSQL queries Initiated and performed database review and cleanup effort freeing up terabytes of network storage Administered SQL Server versions 2008 R2 2017 Created and maintained database access privileges to users Programmer Analyst South Country Health Alliance Owatonna MN November 2014 to Present Worked as database developer and programmer for a countybased health plan Created database objects such as tables views and stored procedures in order to support internal business processes Developed and maintained reusable reports and ETL processes to incorporate state and thirdparty administrator data into internal database systems Managed database users and security Authored updated and maintained internal NET applications Redesigned the provider database to allow for more accurate reporting for state and federal regulations and provider network representation Instituted a new backup and restore process in order to keep development and staging environments in closer alignment with production environment Performed query tuning and analysis resulting in more efficient performance of functions and stored procedures Christopher S Fair  cfermngmailcom Application Developer MTU Onsite Energy Mankato MN August 2013 to November 2014 Served as an allpurpose staff developer for a manufacturing company Created and updated web applications as needed Improved sales order process by authoring an application used by multiple departments Created ETL processes to extract data for an SAP integration Wrote an internal application moving employee suggestions to the web instead of on notecards Network Administrator Sterling Long Term Care Pharmacy Owatonna MN October 2011 to August 2013 Managed databases servers PCs and network for a longterm care pharmacy Managed user accounts performed server and PC upgrades and diagnosed hardware and software problems Worked with vendors on purchasing and fixing network and hardware issues Served as the point of contact for technical issues Performed database backups restores and maintenance Provided technical guidance and advice for new technologies and processes Streamlined inventory ordering process by developing concrete workflow processes and accurate reporting data Created customized Crystal Reports for management and daytoday activities Application
